==Useful Info==
[[Elephant slug]]s are big, tough, and hit like a ton of bricks. Engaging them in melee can very often be a lethal mistake. Fortunately, they move at less than half the average character's speed.

==Tips & Tricks==
*So long as you have room to maneuver and no other monsters attack you, [[kiting]] them is easy.
*They have 20 [[HD]]. Don't [[polymorph]] them unless you're looking for [[out-of-depth]] trouble.

==History==
*Elephant slugs were removed in [[0.15]]. They can still be encountered as [[derived undead]] in [[the Crypt]].
